titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that it is the role of the Federal Government to defend the territorial integrity and inviolability of the United States border with Mexico.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that it is the role of the Federal Government to defend the territorial integrity and inviolability of the United States border with Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Border Security, Facilitation, and Operations.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that it is the role of the federal government to defend the territorial integrity and inviolability of the U.S. border with Mexico.
